ICE System

The 'ICE' hardware and software framework that implements large arrays of interconnected FPGA-based data acquisition, signal processing and networking nodes economically.

Papers

  • ICE-based Custom Full-Mesh Network for the CHIME High Bandwidth Radio Astronomy Correlator
  • ICE: a scalable, low-cost FPGA-based telescope signal processing and networking system
